post.content:
Job Description:
In the Toronto Metro area, Aquent is recruiting for creative graphic designers with 2 - 5 years of experience in print work. These roles are an excellent opportunity for you to showcase your creativity and design capabilities while working with fun, energetic design teams.   Potential day-to-day responsibilities:  * Create designs, concepts, and sample layouts based on the client's needs  * Think creatively to produce new ideas  * Review final layouts and suggest improvements as needed  * Develop graphics and layouts for a wide variety of projects  * Confer with clients to discuss and determine layout design  * Produce accurate and high quality work  * Work to tight deadlines   Skills you'll need to accomplish goals:  * Proficiency in Adobe InDesign, Photoshop, and Illustrator  * Ability to meet deadlines and be self-motivated  * Capable of multitasking and managing changing priorities  * Comfortable working on a team or independently  * Ability to think creatively and come up with creative concepts  * Ability to generate and manipulate graphic images  * Projects might include brochures, direct mail, posters, books and magazines  * Production skills are a big plus   The bare minimum:  * Knowledge of design trends  * Two to five years design work experience  * Bachelors degree
post.title: Jr.Graphic Designer -Aquent
